column3: In 2005 we gained a conservation award in the Research and Light Industry category of the British Trust for Ornithology - Hanson Business Bird Challenge
The station won the same award in Medium Inland Site category of the 2000 BTO / Tarmac Bird Challenge

column2: Following on from the success of the Broom's Barn Birdbox webcam last year, we were hoping to repeat it this year. However, the blue tits have decided to nest in an old unused ashtray nearby!
